official.headline: System Reset Announced
official.anchor_line: All BCI and Council records have been erased as part of a citywide protocol update.
official.contextual_reframing: A decisive reset removes outdated data ensuring the city’s systems adapt to new needs and community priorities.

official.headline: Citizens Share Proof
official.anchor_line: Residents use physical documents and personal testimony to confirm identities and histories.
official.contextual_reframing: Resourceful citizens demonstrate resilience by finding new ways to verify their stories and rebuild local trust.

official.headline: Community Leads Forward
official.anchor_line: Residents gather in public spaces to create new councils based on trust and shared memory.
official.contextual_reframing: Collective initiative and cooperation set Stenograd on a renewed path guided by people’s voice and transparent consensus.

underground.headline: City Records Wiped
underground.anchor_line: The system memory is gone — no BCI, no Council files, just empty screens.
underground.contextual_reframing: It wasn’t an upgrade. Halden’s code wiped it all. Now nobody knows who makes the rules or who's in charge.

underground.headline: New Identity Black Market
underground.anchor_line: Residents scramble for old photos, papers, and testimony — truth up for trade and barter.
underground.contextual_reframing: When the system’s proof burns, our only records are what we keep and share. Real stories, not just what the Council allowed.

underground.headline: Power Back To The Streets
underground.anchor_line: Forget the officials. Neighborhoods gather in parks to choose leaders and settle scores face-to-face.
underground.contextual_reframing: With the last digital leash gone, Stenograd learns what community means when the system can’t decide for you.
